courses.name: HVAC I
courses.description: This course is the core introduction to basic construction skills covering essential topics such as basic safety

courses.name: HVAC II
courses.description: This course completes the HVAC Career Academy coursework. Students can choose to participate in a skills-based internship or apprenticeship or stay on campus to complete the advanced course curriculum. The NCCER HVAC Level 1 curriculum covers essential project-based work topics such as Introduction to HVACR*
